title: Bug 49235: `ServletContainerInitializer` onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet is not expected class
description: When calling `onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet, ServletContext ctx)` method of `ModuleInitializer` class, the output is 'MySomeClass' instead of 'MySomeAnn'.
OB: When calling `onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet, ServletContext ctx)` method, the output is 'MySomeAnn'.
EB: When calling `onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet, ServletContext ctx)` method, the output should be 'MySomeAnn'.
